content: MIAMI BEACH, Fla. (AP) - A man was killed and two women were wounded in a shooting early Sunday at a Miami Beach nightclub, police said.

Authorities began receiving reports of shots being fired just before 4 a.m. at the address for the Gala nightclub in the city's South Beach area, Miami Beach police said in a news release.Responding officers said they found three people with apparent gunshot wounds. A man and two women were transported to a Miami trauma center, where the man died, police said. The women were expected to recover.Police didn't report making any arrests or identify any suspects or a motive for the shooting.The nightclub didn't immediately respond to an email seeking comment.Miami Beach has dealt with a spate of weekend shootings in recent months.
